title: Drake, Tom Hanks, Tiger King, Walmart and more.
itunes:title: Drake, Tom Hanks, Tiger King, Walmart and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are here fighting with you and y'all are currently within a miracle. Steve is in need of some lotion! The Chief Love Officer gives us the real on a lady's concern about her situation. Drake shows us a picture of his son and Tom Hanks is back in the US. A preacher in Tampa is arrested. Tiger King on Netflix has the whole crew talking. We also talk about the last movie that we watched. Trump will not pay for Harry and Meghan's security detail. Walmart has seen a surge in shirt sales. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve is simply giving us a reason to look up and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
